short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a helpful warning where terrible opinions are detected.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transforms the name of a certain "games journalist" into a helpful icon for easier recognition. 

Now includes "Polygone" feature! Now you get a second chance to avoid the depression and anger faced when reading a certain terrible "games journalism" site.
